name: Color Punch
description:
This is my Project  for the 2 Buttons Jam:Color Punch!

A Game Where you must use speed and reflexes to hit the enemies fastestes as possible!All in an pixel style!

Enjoy!And remember to check very well the game i s violent safe enterteiment with absolutely no hidden thing!

Special thanks to ray nexus: https://ray-nexus.itch.io/(music) and Nerb-Princess for the art!
